Keywords: Champions , Defenders , X-Factor , X-Men
Real Name: Robert "Bobby" Drake
Special Powers
MOVEMENT: Characters
ICE SLIDES ALL OVER CENTRAL PARK: When Iceman moves, after resolutions he may make a close attack targeting a character whose square he moved through and didn't target with an attack this action. If he hits with that attack, you may give a hit character an Ice Wall token if it doesn't already have one, removing any on other characters. // If an effect (including clearing) would remove action tokens from a character with an Ice Wall token, remove the Ice Wall token instead.
TIME TO COOL THINGS DOWN A BIT: Regeneration, Toughness. // Barrier as FREE.
CHILL OUT!: When Iceman attacks, give each hit character an action token.

July 7, 2022
Oathful
Hope you didn't trade this guy away like I did, because his price is going to shoot up. For the most part he's the same Iceman from six years ago (wow, that's longer than I thought), however that definitely isn't a criticism. He was great when he released, and now they've trimmed off nearly half his cost AND powered him up. The change to the Ice Wall is interesting, being able to stop someone from clearing is a neat way of interpreting them being covered in ice, but the original Ice Wall having them being unable to do anything just felt more "frozen in ice". I do like that it still retains its power of locking people down though, it makes me want to run him with Malekith from WotR. Thematic: 8.5/10, Viability: 9.5/10, Fun Factor: 9/10, fairly balanced figure
